thread.title: Victoria Beckham strides out in a 'brown paper bag' look - and still looks Posh
thread.title_full: Victoria Beckham strides out in a 'brown paper bag' look - and still looks Posh

author: Ashleigh Rainbird
title: Victoria Beckham strides out in a 'brown paper bag' look - and still looks Posh

organizations.name: spice girls hit spice up your life

text:
Victoria Beckham steps out in what looks like a huge brown paper bag (Photo: GC Images) Share   
Victoria Beckham strides out in what looks like a huge brown paper bag – and still makes it look Posh. 
The designer , 42, rocked the oversized camel suit in New York as her new children’s line for US discount store Target was unveiled in its first advert – soundtracked with the Spice Girls hit Spice Up Your Life. 
As it launched, the former Posh Spice told fans her style tip was to “keep it simple”. 
She said: “Getting dressed in the morning should be easy – use classic pieces.” 
The former Spice Girl was spotted earlier this week beaming from ear to ear. Victoria still manages to look Posh (Photo: GC Images) It's a new look for Victoria (Photo: GC Images) 
The Spice Girl was caught smiling from ear to ear and looking like whatever she's just seen or heard was absolutely the funniest thing she's ever seen or heard. 
The mum-of-four looked super happy as she was caught off guard grinning like a Cheshire cat on a shopping trip. Like us on Facebook
